title: Perspective Agricultural Extension: Practice makes perfect

tasks.task: Realizing the necessity of practical teaching in agricultural education
subtasks: Recognize the limitation of classroom learning for World Development graduates
Understand the goal of strengthening field-based practical teaching in the department
Acknowledge the importance of exposure to rural life for professional competence
Appreciate the role of practical teaching in improving agricultural productivity

tasks.task: Discussing the Agricultural Development-led Industrialization strategy
subtasks: Comprehend the long-term strategy of Agricultural Development-led Industrialization
Connect the strategy to achieving faster growth and economic development
Recognize the importance of skilled and competent human resources in rural development

tasks.task: Evaluating the role of the Department of Rural Development and Agricultural Extension
subtasks: Understand the department's goal to produce competent and dynamic graduates
Acknowledge the contribution of the department to agricultural development policy and food security strategies
